metadata.title: Mapped Sea Surface Parameters from Nimbus-7 SMMR

creators.name: Space Administration (NASA), Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC)

metadata.description: To document satellite observations using SMMR sensors to observe sea and sea-ice surfaces.
